long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Genius' IQ values are not everyone's cup of tea. Some people think that the IQ system should be abolished altogether, which this add-on aims to do. For those who'd rather use Genius without seeing user's IQ values, pressburgify simply hides those values when the page is rendered, effectively removing them and creating an IQ-free experience.
